Text:
Classification: Scripted
Genre: Crime | Drama | Medical
Status: New Series
Network: CBC ( Canada)
Airs: Tuesdays at 09:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: January 08, 2013
Episode Order: 13

A unique blend of a police and medical drama inspired by the real-life experiences of police officers and mental-health professionals, presenting a bold depiction of the psychological side of policing and the emotional impact on front-line workers and reflecting the reality that an overwhelming percentage of police calls involve people with mental illnesses or psychiatric disorders.

(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-34020)
